alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 3:46PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...GUSTY OUTFLOW WINDS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTY THROUGH 430 PM MDT... At 345 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty outflow winds along a line extending from 4 miles northwest of Ellsworth Air Force Base to 3 miles south of Black Hawk to Silver City. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Rapid City, Rapid Valley, southern Ellsworth Air Force Base, Box Elder, Johnson Siding, Hisega, and Pactola Reservoir around 350 PM MDT. Reptile Gardens and Sheridan Lake around 400 PM MDT. Rapid City Airport, Bear Country, and Black Gap around 405 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Rockerville and Hart Ranch. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 54 and 72. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City
